entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11.
